short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: On Amazon, this extension will display book availability in Durham County Public Library.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will search by book title in Durham County Public Library in Durham, North Carolina, and displays the book's availability on Amazon's book pages. 

Version 1.2:
Changed wordings for "Found" and "Not Found" results
Added a hyperlink for "Not Found" results so that users can search and explore the library catalog themselves.
